title: Is Eminem’s music hip hop or rap? - Quora

response.answer_text: Eminem’s music is rap, but old-school hiphop contains rap. That’s why people who listen to Eminem are called “oldheads” by kids who don’t know what they’re talking about.
Uhm... Rap is the music of the HIP HOP Culture. After selling as many albums around the world as him, you could also call him POP.
